description: Zeroth Law Toolkit (zlt) - Enforces the Zeroth Law of Code Quality.

options.name: -v, --verbose
options.description: Increase verbosity: -v for INFO, -vv for DEBUG.

options.name: -c, --config
options.description: Path to configuration file (e.g., pyproject.toml). Overrides auto-detection.

install-git-hook.description: Installs the custom ZLT pre-commit hook

restore-git-hooks.description: Restores standard pre-commit hooks backed up by ZLT
